attributes.action: A snap General Election so WE the people can choose who represents us in future
attributes.additional_details: By signing this petition you WILL be voicing your right to choose your leader. Remember if the new party leader is elected, their term could run till 2020 so its three and half years before you could choose your next leader.
attributes.background: We the general public voted to take back control so we can choose who and how we want them running our country. Yet its almost a joke that when a prime minister resigns from leadership the entire general public are not involved in who should take the country forward especially at this critical time
